description.p: ROS-Industrial support for the ABB IRB 1600 - 6/1.45.
This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files for ABB IRB 1600 - 6/1.45 manipulators. This currently includes the base model.
Joint limits and max joint velocities are based on the information in the ABB data sheets. All URDFs / XACROs are based on the default motion and joint velocity limits.
Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.
